entries.femaleVariant: Why we meetin' here and not at your pad?
entries.maleVariant: Why're we meetin' here and not at your pad?

entries.femaleVariant: Whole thing's fucked up, huh? Wouldn't wanna be in her pants.
Why're we meeting here instead of at your apartment?
Unusual place for a meeting.
Cozy little joint – doesn't really match your style, though.
entries.maleVariant: It's a cozy little joint – doesn't really match your style, though.

entries.femaleVariant: But it's perfect for a one-on-one.
Thank you for coming.
Because I have something to confess. In private. Not in front of Jeff.
OK, confess away.
So you knew what I was going to find.
Notice any changes in yourself?
Notice any changes in yourself?
On several occasions my friends pointed out that I was acting strangely.
So the whole time, you knew what I could end up finding?
I don't know who, how or why... but they're changing us.
That concealed room in our apartment…
Mentioned any of this to Jeff?
entries.maleVariant: Mention any of this to Jeff?

entries.femaleVariant: I tried, I did. But he's blinded to everything. He just laughed, said I was imagining things.
He once brought up a vacation that we never went on, swear to God!
He went on about it in such detail, I almost started believing him…
Really wanna keep living a lie? Jefferson oughta know.
You were lying the whole time.
You knew who sent the intruder but just strung me along anyway, Liz?
entries.maleVariant: You knew who sent the intruder but just strung me along anyway, Liz.

entries.femaleVariant: I-I didn't have a choice. I didn't know what to do...
Ahh... A-a while ago I started noticing some changes in Jeff's behavior.
He stopped reading, forgot the title of his favorite movie, even his musical taste changed overnight.
His personality... He seemed to be changing right in front of me, becoming someone else.
Relax, no need to rush.
Cut a deal with 'em?
They threaten you?
They threaten you? Try to blackmail you?
And? Cut some kinda deal with 'em?
entries.maleVariant: And? You cut some kinda deal with 'em?

entries.femaleVariant: No. I was told that our perfect lives could fall apart at any minute. That I have my husband's safety to think about.
So I'm begging you, V... Jefferson can't find out about any of this. Ever.
They said I was walking on thin ice, that if we kept stirring up trouble, Jeff could have an... "accident."
But dammit, Elizabeth. Ya gonna ignore this? Somebody poking around in your heads?
entries.maleVariant: Dammit, Elizabeth. Ya gonna ignore this? Somebody poking around in your heads?

entries.femaleVariant: Askin' me to lie to my employer?
What choice do I have? To get myself killed? Or see my husband dragged away from me?
I'm going to tell Jeff that SSI was spying for his rival, Holt. You just need to confirm what I say.
What if I'm just not on board?
Really prepared to fire SSI?
And if I'm not on board?
You have a choice. Just remember, any consequences will not be yours to deal with.
Truly prepared to fire SSI? After the threats? It'd be brave, but risky as all get-out…
entries.maleVariant: You're truly prepared to fire SSI? After the threats? It'd be brave, but risky as all get-out…

entries.femaleVariant: I can't accept strangers spying on us while we sleep. Not under my own roof.
Mh-hm.
I'll add a meeting in Reconciliation Park to Jeff's schedule. He'll be waiting.
Since I can't know if I'll remember this conversation tomorrow, I'm counting on you not to forget what I asked of you.
Speaking of... Overlapping memories, changing personalities – remind you of anything?
What would you have done?
No, their case and ours – entirely different.
No – no, this is different. Saw it yourself. They're purposely modifying their minds' individual thoughts.
entries.maleVariant: No, this is different. You saw it yourself. They're purposely modifying their minds, individual thoughts.

entries.femaleVariant: Mhm. Peralez'd make a damn nice next-gen puppet. Even in my day there were whispers about this kinda stuff.
So, in my pants, what would you do?
Some real rat-bastards behind this. Someone's gotta take 'em down.
Fuck knows what kind of shit a mayor controlled by puppet masters could pull.
But yeah, you could end up puttin' their lives at risk. Or not. Tough choice, V.
Convenient?
Here we are, then. What is it?
After, there was no record of the call. It was as if it had never happened.
Then they wiped any record of our conversation. It was as if it had never happened.
I'll take full responsibility for anything SSI goes on to do. I'm just asking you not to get Jefferson involved.
But hey, at least we know what we're up against.
After some time.
Wanted everything to just go on and flow on 'cause it was convenient.
You think I'm having fun? You have no idea what it's like, living like this.
Once, I said we should visit his brother's grave, and he told me that he'd been an only child!
And got nothing out of it?
Why didn't you tell Jefferson?
Is that it? Or is there anything else?
Have you talked to Jeff?
Could be just you who forgot. Maybe they just wiped the trip from your memory?
entries.maleVariant: Could be just you who forgot. Maybe they wiped the trip from your memory?

entries.femaleVariant: Hell, I don't know anymore! Don't you get that?
Haven't told me the whole story yet, have you?
entries.maleVariant: You haven't told me the whole story yet, have you?

entries.femaleVariant: Ehh, I saw a stranger in our apartment one night, tinkering with the monitors.
But I was in such a state by then that I didn't know if I could trust my own eyes.
So you didn't do anything?
I don't remember what happened. I talked to security the next morning.
Find it strange you took this to security instead of your husband.
entries.maleVariant: I find it strange you took this to security instead of your husband.

entries.femaleVariant: I thought I was going insane. I wanted to see what was on the feeds first…
There was nothing there, of course, so what was I supposed to tell Jeff?
Lemme guess. Cams didn't pick anything up?
The guy just shrugged and said I must've dreamt it.
He showed me the recording, of course. I felt like a lunatic.
And then the next day... I got a call.
Who was it?
Them. Whoever "they" are.
There was a garbled voice on the other end. He never introduced himself.
His life depends on it.
Even by risking the Peralezes' lives?
What they're doing to us is one thing. But when you found that concealed room…
How so?
I'm sure I'd seen it before but must have somehow forgotten…
It was. You know... i-it's at times like those you start to question reality.
That's when I started thinking something bad was happening. Something... insidious. And not just with Jeff.
Could be you're just saying what you've been programmed to say.
Well, you got the perfect life, a prominent husband. You don't lack for a thing.
entries.maleVariant: You got the perfect life, a prominent husband. You don't lack for a thing.

entries.femaleVariant: What if you're just saying what they programmed you to say?
Just reading off a script based on thoughts planted in your head.
All I know is I love my husband, and I want him to be safe and... and happy.
Or that's what they want you to know…
You know what Jeff'll do if you tell him? I know my husband. He'll start looking on his own.
He can't find out about this. It... it'd destroy him.
I won't. But that's all I can promise.
Goodbye, V.
I... I'm sorry, my nerves are shot. I can't gather my thoughts.
No rush.
Has something happened since we last met?
Wasn't that long ago we last met. Something happen since then?
entries.maleVariant: Wasn't that long ago since we last met. Something happen since then?

entries.femaleVariant: No... I mean, something did happen, though not recently.
It's a long story. I don't quite know how to tell you... where to even start…
Ah, that must've been hard…
What about it?
I find that terrifying.
What difference does it make where?
You think if I tell him everything that he'll go and pick a fight he can't win?
I don't just think – I know. One thing hasn't changed – Jeff's still a fighter.
And he'll go down swingin'... Huh. So how do we play this?
entries.maleVariant: And he'll go down swingin'... Mhm. So how do we play this?

entries.femaleVariant: You think Jeff'll pick a fight he can't win?
Cognitive pattern fluctuators, remote neural re-networking... In layman's terms – gaslighting.
The beauty is that everything's fair game – subliminal TV signals, high-density emitters in your electric toothbrush – you name it.
[Stand]
[Sit]
Will you sit? Please…?
V? Are you still with me?
An enny for your thoughts?
